description: Newly unveiled bright frescos are believed to show the food that was available in the Roman city.
title: Pompeii: Ancient 'fast food' counter to open to the public
title_page: Pompeii: Ancient 'fast food' counter to open to the public - BBC News
maintext: A "fast food" shop from the ancient Roman city of Pompeii, which was destroyed in a volcanic eruption almost 2,000 years ago, is to open to the public - for viewings only - next year.
